    • Constructor Detail

      • PasswordValidator

        public PasswordValidator(Site site,
                 com.vaadin.data.Property originalPasswordProperty,
                 String passwordVerificationPropertyId)
        Constructor for setting the required parameters for validator.
        Parameters:
        site - the site
        originalPasswordProperty - The original password property used to set value on each change so it is available for the other validator.
        passwordVerificationPropertyId - The password verification property ID used to trigger revalidation of that property when original password property changes.
